scripts.test: npm run compile && npx mocha --timeout 5000 --exit --recursive test

scripts.truster-v0: npm run compile && npx mocha --timeout 5000 --exit test/truster-v0/truster.challenge.js
scripts.selfie: npm run compile && npx mocha --timeout 5000 --exit test/selfie/selfie.challenge.js
scripts.compromised: npm run compile && npx mocha --timeout 5000 --exit test/compromised/compromised.challenge.js
scripts.puppet: npm run compile && npx mocha --timeout 5000 --exit test/puppet/puppet.challenge.js
